title: Marine Assaulted at McDonald’s by Black Lives Matter Activists?
subtitle: Marine veteran Christopher Marquez was involved in an altercation at a Washington, D.C., McDonald's, but police said there was no indication the argument involved Black Lives Matter activists.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Marine vet Christopher Marquez was assaulted at a Washington, D.C., McDonald's retaurant by Black Lives Matter activists.
